head-meta.description: As an organization, we're committed to bringing excellence to the customer experience in every way we possible can, including serving our user base with the urgency and care you deserve.
head-meta.title: The Vinovest Satisfaction Guarantee

head.description1: At Vinovest, we are committed to providing our customers with a great investing experience.
head.description2: If, for any reason, you are not completely satisfied with your Vinovest account, we will do everything we can to make it right, up to and including waiving Vinovestâ€™s management fees for the next 90 days.
